column1: The Tolkien Trilogy is a series of games which cover ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' which also included paperback editions of ''The Hobbit'', ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and ''[[The Two Towers]]''. The Tolkien Software Adventure Series is a couple of Software Adventure games that cover ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and included the European paperback editions, ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', ''[[The Two Towers]]'' and ''[[The Return of the King]]''.
